metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20723 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in color_templates.php in Cacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintended characters in the Name field for a Color.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20723` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1').
